positive_examples: This is an example of ionized atom.
The ionized atom demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed ionized atom in this context.
A typical case of ionized atom would involve these features.
The concept of ionized atom applies here.
An atom that has gained or lost one or more electrons, giving it a net electric charge.
negative_examples: This is an example of free atom, not ionized atom.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: FreeAtom, or other types of Atom

definition: An atom that has gained or lost electrons, resulting in a net electric charge.
